author: leomarysleon
title: Clean PLanet
body:
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaUyUCZ813FCN32VzeAECBLazfxyPSQB8BdaLd3r9t3Vk/image.png)

This movement aims to clean up the planet and free it from pollution due to the lack of awareness of us human beings.

The damage we cause when we throw our waste in green areas, beaches or simply when we do not classify our garbage in plastic, glass or paper is visible to all.

It is so easy to make a small effort and contribute to the sanitation of our environment.


Since July 1, 2018, Cleanplanet has promoted an initiative within the Steemit platform offering its cure vote through the @cleanplanet account.

You just have to make a post with a video showing your ecological contribution. Whether you are in a city, in nature, at sea, anyone with a Steem account can present an action test on the Steem blockchain and receive a reward for their contribution to the planet.



They are also promoting the CT token on steem-engine.

You just have to "burn" a few CT tokens by following the steps below:
After posting your c

### Hipertensión Arterial
<div class=text-justify>Entre nebulosas recuerdo aquel tremendo dolor de cabeza. Imágenes confusas de aquel día se entrelazan en mi mente. Me sentí impotente por no poder proteger a mi familia como siempre lo había hecho, quería transmitirles calma con mis gestos pero sólo podía mirar hacia mi lado izquierdo. En mi mente tenía todas esas palabras que debía decirles pero no podía hablar. Traté muchas veces de ponerme de pié pero no logré levantarme. Recuerdo haber escuchado sirenas de ambulancia, muchos gritos y frases de desespero. Tuve que quedarme quieto y dejarme llevar. Me di c

author: leomarysleon
title: Sin tanto espacio
body:
Sin tanto espacio es otra de mis canciones favoritas interpretada por mi cantante favorito Franco de Vita, quiero compartir el vídeo y la letra de esta súper canción y que para mi en este justo momento de mi vida es la mejor de todas, es para ti donde quieras que estés...
Donde quiera que vayas, yo estaré contigo Al principio, al final o a mitad de camino Yo estaré como sabes esperando ese día Que la vida nos ponga frente a frente de nuevo Se que no puedo detenerte, cada quien es dueño de si Y vuela si quieres volar, desde arriba puedes mirar mejor No tardarás mucho en bajar y del suelo no pasarás No hay tanto espacio como se ve No hay tanto cielo como se ve Y donde quiera que vaya yo te llevo conmigo Y se suele decir queremos buenos amigos Mira que la vida suele dar muchas vueltas Y a veces lo que tenemos no le damos valor Y dejaré las puertas abiertas y toda posibilidad Y vuela si quieres volar, desde arriba puedes mirar mejor No tardarás mucho en bajar y del su

author: leomarysleon
title: Te veo venir soledad
body:
Hoy quiero compartir una canción de uno de mis cantantes preferidos, hoy mas que nunca me siento identificada. Cuando la vida nos estremece bien rudo, es cuando realmente empezamos a vivir y de manera automática tu vida se convierte en antes y después de ese acontecimiento...
Aquí les dejo la letra y el vídeo de una de mis canciones favoritas de mi cantante favorito en español: Franco de Vita
***Te veo venir soledad*** No me digas que Acabamos de comprender Que lo nuestro llego a su final Que sin mi tu puedes continuar Te veo venir soledad Y no me digas que No merezco lo que recibí Y que yo nunca te comprendí Pero, cuanto esperabas de mi? Te veo venir soledad Que las noches no tienen final Que la vida sin tu no me vale de na' Otro golpe para el corazón Que dejaste tirado aquí en este rincón Te veo venir soledad Y no me digas que Que algún día tal vez volverás Que por ahora no hay nada que hablar Muchas cosas, si, para olvidar Te veo venir soledad

author: leomarysleon
title: Extrañar
body:
<center>El tan inmune, ella tan dulce... 
Ella aun se levanta en las noches con la misma sensación, vino por ella...
Ella solo tenia ojos para el
Ella aun sueña con su café y el cigarrillo, saben mejor  a su lado...
Ella le explica a su corazón que pronto sanara, el no entiende su idioma
Ella entreno su corazón para no esperar, el es impaciente 
El reparo su corazón y también lo dejo peor
Ella esta triste porque lo extraña
Ella espera un mensaje, el ya no piensa en ella
Ella espera una llamada, el no la extraña
Ella lo ve en todos lados, el no tiene ojos para ella
Ella lo escucha en todos lados, el no tiene oídos para ella
El tiempo, solo el tiempo sanara su corazón herido
Tiempo largo...
Bendito tiempo, ella quiere dormir desde hace un mes
Ella lo ama, lo extraña...</center>

author: leomarysleon
title: GOLDILOCK - store your confidential data and cryptographic assets
body:
### [Goldilock](https://www.goldilock.com/)
Goldilock is revolutionizing the way in which data is stored on the Internet by creating an ecosystem to protect cryptocurrencies and digital assets for individuals and institutions.
We base Goldilock on the premise that your data should not be physically connected to the Internet when you are not using it, but should be available to you from anywhere immediately when you want to access it.
A digital asset management system, we can also say that it is responsible for storing, managing, organizing, processing and distributing digital assets. Its objective is to simplify the management of digital assets and provide authorized users with the search and recovery of the asset they need. The value of the managed asset materializes only if it is accessible to authorized users at the time they need it.
With [Goldilock](https://www.goldilock.com/), data remains physically disconnected from the Internet when not in use. It uses several authentication factors to access the sy
root_title: GOLDILOCK - store your confidential data and cryptographic assets

Bee Gees
I can think of younger days
When living for my life

I could never see tomorrow
But I was never told about the sorrow

How can you stop the sun from shining?
What makes the world go round?
How can you mend this broken man?
How can a loser ever win?
Please help me mend my broken heart
And let me live again
I can still feel the breeze
That rustles through the trees
And misty memories of days gone by
We could never see tomorrow
But no one said a word about the sorrow
How can you mend a broken heart?
How can you stop the rain from falling down
How can you stop the sun from shining
What makes…</center>

author: leomarysleon
title: GoChain - Ecological Blockchain
body:
<div class=text-justify>What is GoChain?
GoChain is a network that solves scalability issues plaguing some of the modern blockchain networks.

Many new blockchain companies are built on top of Ethereum. Ethereum is currently limited to 13 transactions per second. Given the huge user base, this results in slow transaction speeds and limits the scalability of the network itself as well as DApps that are built on it.

GoChain solves this issue by introducing a new consensus algorithm called POR(Proof of Reputation). It is faster, cheaper and easy to implement

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPW6rFP2udkPz8QHBDpqJ9MnkEPhSCYLbFBYdEYx3NNQA/image.png)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GoChain is live and ready to use. It is already delivering on it's promise and

title: Daddykirbs Cool Curators Contest # 17 Entry - @leomarysleon
body:
***Wow! Look why you should not discard the Lemon Peel...***
As a lover of condiments, strong flavors, Arab food ... this complements new ideas to prepare rich dishes by adding this ingredient. I invite you to watch this excellent video by Blake Kirby where he explains how to prepare lemon powder.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CrVZFqbBu64
Here you have a step by step well explained about the process of dehydration of the lemon shell to prepare the seasoning. By Blake Kirby ***You need:*** 1- Lemon shell 2- Tray 3- Waxed paper 4-Glass container ***Preparation:***   Place the wax paper on the tray, then the shells on top of the paper.   Take to the oven with the lowest temperature for 24 hours.   Take out of the oven, put in the blender the dehydrated lemon shells, liquefy and go! We have Lemon Powder to complement the condiments you use in your kitchen. Do not forget to keep it in a glass container to preserve t

author: leomarysleon
title: Pagan Party of Ants
body:
It seems a battle but in reality they are dancing, today as every year they celebrate with dance, liquor and tobacco ... They tell that they drink until they lose consciousness, ants from other roads come to celebrate and drink ... The queen does not participate, just look carefully chosen to sacrifice in honor of the party...
![sand-ground-wildlife-dirt-insect-fauna-17076-pxhere.com.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPnkDXjVHijcNNwDD5zMsM6WduWnKHFXT3NWrhVdfrdvP/sand-ground-wildlife-dirt-insect-fauna-17076-pxhere.com.jpg)
***Photography is free, The photograph was taken from the page https://pxhere.com/*** #photography
She is sad, nobody looks at her heart, they just look at her smile and think that everything is fine, at nightfall with each minute that passes with each tear tells the story of her broken heart, coffee and philosophy that awaits another long night
@leomaryss

author: leomarysleon
title: "Evolution marks"
body:
<center>***The Marks of Evolution***</center>  

<div class=text-justify>My name is José, but everyone in my neighborhood tells me dirty knees; from school, in the football team, and it's because I'm different, they make fun, they say they crawl too much, or maybe they walk like a dog or I'm raised with wolves, but they're not dirty, it's a strange effect caused by the sun ... The strange thing is that to overcome this trauma as a child I went to many therapies for the last call regression, what is impressive in them is that in three past lives that came to my mind I was always on my knees, I remember being a German child kneeling asking bread and receive a response and everything turned white, advancing I saw myself as a soldier, it was raining and I was kneeling in the puddle with several more, the cold of a rifle touched my forehead and that light returned, in the last one, just surrounded of nature, I think I was an important monk and I spent a lot of time on the ground and I did not see anymore. In this

author: leomarysleon
title: From My Panoramic
body:
***From My Panoramic it looks better things***
It was thought that the problem was space, the problem is internal, there they are deforming the future of those who did not do anything to deserve it. This is a panoramic view of the before, in a year I will show after.
![Daphne panorama.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb4PTTg8NQ5cwr5E6uafRn9fowYQ3EnnXKMdpvetAi6uh/Daphne%20panorama.jpg)
***This panoramic is from my daughter, taken before orthodontics***
@air-clinic #photography
Se pensaba que el problema era el espacio, el problema es interno, ahí están ellas deformando el futuro de quien no le hizo nada para merecerlo. Esta es una vista panorámica del antes, en un año mostraré el después...

author: leomarysleon
title: STACH Short Story Contest #29: 199 words -Sinners
body:
<center>***Sinners***</center>   

<div class=text-justify>Yes, my grandmother says that sinners go to hell and I say that we all go to the same place once we are dead: to the cemetery. My knees dirty are now bleeding because the imaginary friend thinks my sin is too big and must stay until they decide what my penance ... The court goes to another level, I'm in the final judgment, it smells like candles, singing is heard sinners ... the imaginary friend wants to take me to heaven, I tell you not to waste your time because Aerosmith and took me, drank coffee in the Grail, we ate chocolate on my last dinner while filosofábamos about my stay in Steemit ... while I wait I offer nails - I'm sorry and I have mine... on the walls of the antrum are the photographs of sinners who made history, smells of sin and candles, decide that it is not enough punishment for my stay there, now my judgment is masterful in one place secret. Relaxed I smoke a cigarette I just want to get up and polish my nails. No more! I do not re

author: leomarysleon
title: Recipe Churros
body:
***Recipe Churros:***

<center>**Ingredients:**</center>

<div class=text-justify>
¾ cup of water

¾ cup of milk
1 cdita vanilla
½ butter bar
1 cup of flour
½ cup corn flour
1 pinch of cinnamon
1 cdita of baking powder
1 tbsp of sugar
2 beaten eggs
vegetable oil, the one necessary for frying
1 cup of sugar
1 tbsp of cinnamon
1 cup of dulce de leche
1 cup of hazelnut cream

***Preparation:***

1. In a saucepan over medium heat, mix water, milk, vanilla and butter. Let the mixture heat up.
2. In a bowl, combine the flour, cinnamon, baking powder and sugar. Slowly stir and stir until a ball forms.
3. Remove from heat and add eggs mixing with force.
4. When the mixture is unified, place it in a large pastry bag with star nozzle.
5. Form strips of dough forming churros on a board. Heat the oil in a pot and fry the churros until they are golden brown. Remove on a plate with paper towel.
6. In a tray or platter, mix the sugar and cinnamon and pass the churros through the mixture until they adhere well.
7. Place the

author: leomarysleon
title: The contests of petals-Flowers- Orchidea Dactylorhiza
body:
***Beautiful flowers that bloom in May***
Hey Steemians! This is my contribution to the #petals contest initiated by @petals, a wonderful and great idea of our dear friends @adrianobalan and @sardrt
![orchidea dactylorhiza.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXXgfsaY5kJ7HCTTwKuZgfT9zursgWYbgq2cRQzoudDuS/orchidea%20dactylorhiza.jpg)
**
This photo was captured by the camera of my Samsung Galaxy S6, I love flowers.
** This beautiful *Orchidea* blooms between the month of May and the month of July, its name is *Orchidea Dactylorhiza* and the pleasant one is in humid places, for that reason it is necessary to maintain the garden with a lot of water. Live also in a wild way in meadows, gutters, river banks. ***
I hope you enjoy my beautiful Orchidea.
***
@leomaryss
root_title: The contests of petals-Flowers- Orchidea Dactylorhiza

author: leomarysleon
title: My Bypass Gástrico
body:
<center>***My #introduceyourself II***</center> 

<div class=text-justify>I was always obese, since I was a child, I think since I was born with 4.5 kg. Always the greatest of my class, applied, responsible, the most beautiful, every year in carnivals I was chosen queen, the most intelligent, outstanding in class with an average of 20 points, also in sports as captain of the volleyball and chess team, the better in table tennis, president of the Bolivarian Society (It was very good in History) and Red Cross, had many freckles reason why it was the mockery of all.

Chubby, freckled, with a brilliant mind, she was the model girl but victim of many teasing, including some elderly people. None of that affected me because since I was born I knew I had to be strong, it was not an option for me, it was a duty and obligatory. I have no memories of wanting to be skinny, I liked being chubby because I did not see the bad in that.

For reasons of constant teasing I was making a kind of shield, one made in my mind nothi

author: leomarysleon
title: Missing
body:
***<center>Missing for what?</center>***
*<div class=text-justify>Say goodbye to the person you love is not easy, listen to an "see you soon" from that person you love is sad.*

 *From that moment you start to miss everything, coffee does not taste the same without it, a cigarette does not taste the same without it, you hear it everywhere, you look at each person while waiting for a bus (they do not know why you look at them) if only they could read my eyes and transform themselves in that person to run and hug him ... you listen to his voice even on the radio, listening to our music does not help much.*

*The telephone rings and the heart rejoices, you answer and it's not him. No matter you keep waiting while smoking the nostalgia cigarette.*

 *Time is eternal ... Missing is rude, it can be handled but it is not easy.
Night comes and you expect it to appear out of nowhere and say let's smoke and drink coffee, talk about day to day ... then smell it when you go to sleep ...*

*You eat a kilo of Nutella and

author: leomarysleon
title: Flower of the Passion-Passiflora-
body:
# <center>Medicinal properties of the Passion Flower</center> 

<div class=text-justify>The medicinal properties of this beautiful flower are many, its petals once dry you can use it to prepare infusions, oils, creams.

<center>![mburucuya.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaSA3S7K1mTfydaXzCW1RE6Umoi9p1s4HaKsjwRCrLUmW/mburucuya.jpg)</center>
<center>@petals @flowers</center>  
<center>***Passiflora*** from my beautiful garden. Original photography without filters</center>


This flower is very effective in treatments for insomnia and nervousness, due to its strong narcotic effect. ***Passiflora***contains natural serotonin, and a substance called maltol, which also has sedative effects.

In small amounts, you can calm anxiety without causing sleepiness. It also lowers anxiety levels, without suffering the side effects of chemical anxiolytics.

Some scientific studies on its properties confirm that ***Passionflower*** worked on the neurotransmitters GABA (gamma-aminobutyric acid) of the brain, causing calming

author: leomarysleon
title: Remember
body:
<div class=text-justify>Es difícil concentrarse en preparar un post cuando tienes el corazón un poco destrozado porque el cerebro se distrae, no puede pensar. Hay café, cigarrillos y dulce pero el corazón sigue igual no se estimula con nada. El optimismo esta en modo off,  internet no colabora... entonces intentando escribir para participar en un concurso me salió esto, y lo llamare así:

 # Recordar es vivir

Hay recuerdos que no se gastan, no importa cuánto los usemos. Se me olvida que para que mueran debo hacer todo lo contrario, no usarlos más.

Entonces comienzo a bloquearme. Y vienen a mí como un malandro, un atraco por andar de gafa y de golpe como cuchillo filoso ¡zúas! dentro de mi cabeza,  es que recordar no es malo, hasta  lo disfruto, pero sólo hasta que me doy cuenta de que estoy aquí en el ahora, que lo que veo son  refritos de una película vieja, donde ya me sé el final.

 

Y el final es ausencia. El “nunca más” del fulano cuervo de Poe, que en ingles suena mejor:

Never more

Never more

Nev

author: leomarysleon
title: Slim Down Driking Mate
body:
<div class=text-justify>

How nice to get up in the morning and drink a mate! dear friends of Steemit, today I will talk a little about the mate and its benefits, in my case I used it during my weight loss process, including it in my daily diet. I recommend that before you start taking it, consult a nutritionist about including it in a diet that you decide to do. I do not recommend it to people with high blood pressure.


*Que rico levantarme en la mañana y beber un rico mate! mis queridos amigos de Steemit, hoy en este post  les hablaré un poco sobre el mate y sus beneficios, en mi caso lo utilicé durante mi proceso para adelgazar incluyéndolo en mi dieta diaria. Les recomiendo que antes de empezar a tomarlo consulten con un médico nutricionista,  sobre incluirlo en algún régimen alimenticio que decidan hacer. No se los recomiendo a las personas con presión arterial alta.*

The mate increases the good cholesterol (HDL) which generates a better functioning of the cardiovascular system. It helps to lose weigh

author: leomarysleon
title: Hi steemers
body:
Me llamo Leomarys León, vivo en Maturín-Venezuela y Amo el rock! 


Mi vida es un antes y un después 

![11406781_910753055633305_3036612150934652085_n.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWLrm6NYurty7coQeqcbPsbmTSXxQxbP1TTzStB6di9Sf/11406781_910753055633305_3036612150934652085_n.jpg)

Algo breve sobre mi:

Soy de las personas que se empiezan a arreglar tres horas antes de salir para dar vueltas e igual llegar a tiempo y a veces tarde a todos lados. Amo la frontalidad con que digo las cosas, mi terquedad, lo compinchera que soy, mi retrechería, la pasión que le pongo a las cosas que hago, el poder de mi palabra, mi atorrancia, la forma en que me esfuerzo por proyectar dureza para no exponer lo sentimental y llorona que soy, mi incapacidad de disimular el odio por lo injusto, querer compartir así solo tenga una arepita con mantequilla, la facilidad con que puedo aprender tanto sobre lo que me interesa, la afición por los deportes de combate, mi voz dulce y suave, la debilidad por mi hija por el chocolate y el ca

title: Hi steemers
body:
Me llamo Leomarys León, vivo en Maturín-Venezuela y Amo el rock!
 
Mi vida es un antes y un despues

Soy de las personas que se empiezan a arreglar tres horas antes de salir para dar vueltas e igual llegar a tiempo y a veces tarde a todos lados. Amo la frontalidad con que digo las cosas, mi terquedad, lo compinchera que soy, mi retrechería, la pasión que le pongo a las cosas que hago, el poder de mi palabra, mi atorrancia,  la forma en que me esfuerzo por proyectar dureza para no exponer lo sentimental y llorona que soy,  mi incapacidad de disimular el odio por lo injusto, querer compartir así solo tenga una arepita con mantequilla, la facilidad con que puedo aprender tanto sobre lo que me interesa, la afición por  lo
